results.title: Western stories: expressions for the future. [Vol. 1]
results.brief_description:
Western Stories: Expressions for the Future is an inspirational collection of works from young people who, through their association with the Western Chances program, have been given the opportunity to tell their stories and build their own bridge to the future.
Western Chances was established to ensure that financial hardship does not prevent a young person in Melbourne’s West from achieving their maximum potential in life.
results.description:

results.title: The Way I see things
results.brief_description: Ashleigh’s older step-brother has always been there for her. Growing up without a father she turned to her step-brother, learning from his experiences and cherishing the close bond that had formed between them - a bond that Ashleigh is determined to keep.
results.description: Ashleigh’s older step-brother has always been there for her. Growing up without a father she turned to her step-brother, learning from his experiences and cherishing the close bond that had formed between them - a bond that Ashleigh is determined to keep.

results.title: Happy birthday
results.brief_description: Touching dedication to a mother by her eldest child, her only son. Scott talks of his close relationship with his mum, of their journey together through dark times, of change and survival and finally a second chance at life, love and family.

results.title: Two worlds: one me
results.creator_credit: Elinor Moshe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Born in Israel during the Gulf War but eventually moving to Australia, Elinor Moshe finds herself caught between two countries, cultures and traditions.

results.title: iFavourite
results.creator_credit: Peter Ngo, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A glimpse into Peter Ngo’s world of techno music, video games, video editing and fun in the sun at the Alpine School. To Ngo’s mind, doing what you enjoy is the path to happiness and finding yourself.

results.title: Second reality
results.creator_credit: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Always on the move, changing schools, losing new friends, Stacey Fischer escaped from the real world of loneliness to a world where she could create people who couldn’t leave - a place where she would be safe.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Tran family
results.creator_credit: Thuy Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description:
This story is dedicated to Thuy Tran’s father who suddenly found himself raising a family of six young children single-handedly when his wife unexpectedly passed away.
A brief introduction to each member of the Tran family is presented along with a personal tribute from Thuy to her father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Thuy Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Yodit and I
results.creator_credit: Duaa Mahmoud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A tale of heroic acts of a mother’s quest to return her son safe and sound from the battlefields of East Africa in 1896. This inspiring story of Yodit, now half legend, stays alive as it is passed down from one generation to the next.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Duaa Mahmoud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: A tale of heroic acts of a mother’s quest to return her son safe and sound from the battlefields of East Africa in 1896. This inspiring story of Yodit, now half legend, stays alive as it is passed down from one generation to the next.
